css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-a20f259c-u{min-width:100%;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);padding-top:200px;padding-bottom:200px;flex-direction:column;row-gap:0px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-a20f259c-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-1,0,0,0),1);display:block;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-a20f259c-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:500px;top:50px;left:-100px;display:block;filter:blur(70px);}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-a20f259c-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2 svg *{fill:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-2,5,23,33),1);}@media only screen and (max-width:1920px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-a20f259c-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:400px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1366px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-a20f259c-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__2{width:300px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-a20f259c-u{padding-top:60px;padding-bottom:60px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-a20f259c-u{padding-top:40px;padding-bottom:40px;}}
